threads.title: Why doesn't this include [insert game name]?

posts.author: fibonnaci_otters
posts.body: I'm already anticipating people clamoring to have their favorite game title included in an expansion. This game seems custom made for expansions with more games over the years.

posts.author: thesnyderguy
posts.body: They've got a pretty cool idea for that actually. Videos dropping today that discuss it more. There is discussion of expansion packs containing the hot games from the previous year going forward.

posts.author: xionc
posts.body: There may be a problem with including IP games like Star Wars Rebellion or Dune Imperium, even if it only means including game cover on one image... We know some entities take this topic quite serious
